categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Thon's Orchard was a GR-75 medium transport that was part of the Alliance to Restore the Republic's fleet. As one of the GR-75 transports stationed at Echo Base, the Alliance headquarters on the gelid planet of Hoth, Thon's Orchard helped evacuate the compromised outpost during the Battle of Hoth.
